CustomField.description: calculates the number of days between requested and completed
CustomField.formula: (Install_Completed_On__c - Requested_Date__c ) - ( FLOOR ( ( ( (Install_Completed_On__c) - Requested_Date__c ) / 7 ) ) * 2 ) + CASE(MOD ( Requested_Date__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7), 0,CASE( MOD ((Install_Completed_On__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,1,2 ), 1,CASE( MOD ((Install_Completed_On__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,2,1 ), IF(MOD( Requested_Date__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) - MOD((Install_Completed_On__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) <= 0 ,0, IF(MOD((Install_Completed_On__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) = 0,1,-2 ) ))
CustomField.label: Length of Delivery
